description.value:
You hide insulating crystals or other material that releases a strong static charge when the first creature enters the snare's square. That creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:18|traits:uncommon|showDC:all] saving throw.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target takes @Damage[1[persistent,electricity]] damage and takes a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against electricity effects for as long as the persistent electricity damage lasts.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Static Snare]

Critical Failure As failure, and the target attracts nearby dirt and dust. If the target is or becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Invisible], it's merely @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] to creatures that have sight as a precise sense. This effect lasts as long as the persistent electricity damage does.
